title: Kabal
description: Card game, also known as Solitarie. A fun though challenging project, featuring an advanced state management system. It treats each card as its own state, allowing cards to be moved with minimun knowledge of the state of other cards.

title: Norwegian skiing
description: A video portfolio site, requested made for a video-project. Utilizes Contentful as (headless) CMS to allow content editing by website owner. The site displayed here displays mock data however.

title: CV Maker
description: This was a project we worked on for the first weeks at Skyetec. While meant as an internal application, this was also a traning project.

title: Snake
description: A classic game that works on mobile as well as desktop

title: MyPrivateChef
description: MyPrivateChef features a booking service for busy people wanting to hire a chef for a party and aims at connecting people with a passion for cooking and people who love food. The website was made as part of the final project at the Salt bootcamp.
